attributes.action: Petition the government to reinstate the genocide law
attributes.additional_details: So we can feel safe from our own government

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Genocide is already illegal under international law. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
